Articles.Content: i will make a server soon, but i want suggestions for mods/parts/addons you want me to add. i will post a gamedata folder for everybody to download. reply with suggestions and i will see if they conflict, if they don't i will add them:cool:
Isn't posting a Gamedata folder for download against the TOS?

Isn't posting a Gamedata folder for download against the TOS?

I think so.
then I will link to the download locations

then I will link to the download locations

That's the best idea if you are uncertain of the mod licensing. Some mods come with a license that allows you to redistribute and repackage, some don't. And, including the whole GameData folder with the Squad assets would definitely be a no-no.

As for suggestions, I'll suggest keeping the total amount of extra parts to a minimum so that people without supercomputers can run the game without massive start times. Beautification mods like the clouds and planet texture enhancements can usually be optional and definitely worth adding, but for instance, allowing the Novapunch2 parts pack (as good as it is) means everyone wanting to use the server needs a huge mass of extra parts to load up before the game starts.

Edit: I've also moved the thread to General Discussion. It doesn't belong in Rocket Builders, and for now GD is about the most suitable place. Ahem, carry on ladies and gentlemen!

Edited June 21, 2014 by technicalfool
